channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 02:24 Drive alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 02:24 Drive alarm to the Kirovohrad region. Watch for further reports.#Kirovograd This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 23:49 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivsk Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 23:49 Drawing anxiety in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivsk Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
